content: Mark — this is a really important post and thanks for sharing. Understanding a VC’s reasons for theme-based investment is really important. As the CEO of another Computer Vision startup (digitalbridge.eu!) there’s another big play that is highly associated with CV — and that’s machine learning. In reality, with the advent of unguided machine-learning (Deep Learning) and CNN (Convolutional Neural Networks) added into the mix of computer-vision it VASTLY increases the performance of a computer vision system.
